class.name: JarBoxSdf
class.brief_description: A 3D signed distance field (SDF) box primitive.
class.description: This is a basic SDF box object, defined by its center point and extent. The extent determines the box's half-dimensions along each axis.

members.member: Extent defines the size of the bounding box in relation to center. In other words, it's the distance from center to side.
